reviews.text: Location is great. You can walk everywhere easily. Also tram and bus stops next to the hotel. Very clean. Check out-in and out smooth. Great room (521) with views to the castle. Aircon works perfectly well. Lobby and bar modern and comfortable. Food was also great, we had some tapas at the bar.

No complaints here, quality location, efficient staff, comfortable rooms.
Park Inn is solidifying their spot as one of the best hotel brands in Europe with excellent value for their prices, and Kraków’s hotel is a fair example of it.

First time staying at a Radisson hotel, quite nice and upscale overall but some things were not ideal. The water pressure was very very low, I never care about this type of thing but it took 10 minutes to rinse my hair instead of 2 minutes.
Also there was a Bluetooth sound system that the employees did not know how to start. I asked twice but nobody even knew what it was.
Hair dryer was very powerful but not wall integrated which felt a little "cheap".

U need to be prepared ur own water if u can. They only will provide u when u ask for the room service yet they encourage go green not for room cleaning service. Funny thing is that u won’t get a drink and u have to use ur empty bottle to fill ur water at the lobby or buy from them. This kind of 4stars service is lousy. Not recommended for business travellers. Stay here for a week but I can’t get a bottle of water replenishment. Too bad no next time from corporate.

Very bad staff and service. They made my brother sit in the restaurant for 3 hours for 25 zloty. they could have put it under the room, the lobby guy “Micheal” was very rude and didn’t bother to help!!! The room was fine but had so many damages including a broken lock in the bathroom and the bathroom had a very bad smell, they aren’t being cleaned properly.The location is so far from the city as well. I wouldn’t suggest anyone to buy for breakfast if you wake up little late you will only find the leftovers..
